generator.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

contact.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

publications.title: Generation of two iPSC lines from patients with inherited central core disease and concurrent malignant hyperthermia caused by dominant missense variants in the RYR1 gene

donor.disease_description: Central core disease of muscle; Malignant hyperthermia susceptibility caused by dominant missense variants in RYR1 gene
donor.disease_name: Central core disease; Malignant hyperthermia susceptibility 1

genomic_modifications.description: Inherited variant (dominant, 17 other affected family members across 6 generations)
genomic_modifications.genotype: Heterozygous for RYR1 c.6502G > A variant
genomic_modifications.mutation_type: Inherited variant (dominant, 17 other affected family members across 6 generations)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Normal male karyotype confirmed by G-banding at passage 19; 15 metaphases counted, 5 analyzed for each cell line.

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
